languages.text: "Желание сокрыть родовое имя вызывает еще больше подозрений на ваш счет. Однако... пусть и плохо, но мои глаза все же различают благородный герб на ваших одеждах. И компас, особую регалию Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Желание сокрыть родовое имя вызывает еще больше подозрений на ваш счет. Однако... пусть и плохо, но мои глаза все же различают благородный герб на ваших одеждах. И компас, особую регалию Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."
languages.original_text: "Желание сокрыть родовое имя вызывает еще больше подозрений на ваш счет. Однако... пусть и плохо, но мои глаза все же различают благородный герб на ваших одеждах. И компас, особую регалию Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

"Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

"Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

"Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

languages.text: “你试图隐瞒你的姓氏，这只会让我对你更加怀疑。不过……虽然我的眼睛已经不行了，但我依然能看到你衣服上的贵族纹章。还有那个罗盘，那应该是行商浪人特有的标识。”
languages.original_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

traits.locale_text: “你试图隐瞒你的姓氏，这只会让我对你更加怀疑。不过……虽然我的眼睛已经不行了，但我依然能看到你衣服上的贵族纹章。还有那个罗盘，那应该是行商浪人特有的标识。”

languages.text: «Si intenta ocultar su apellido, solo conseguirá que sospeche más de usted. Sin embargo... por débiles que estén mis ojos, siguen pudiendo distinguir el noble blasón de su atuendo. Y la brújula; la insignia única de los Comerciantes Independientes».
languages.original_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

traits.locale_text: «Si intenta ocultar su apellido, solo conseguirá que sospeche más de usted. Sin embargo... por débiles que estén mis ojos, siguen pudiendo distinguir el noble blasón de su atuendo. Y la brújula; la insignia única de los Comerciantes Independientes».

languages.text: 「あなたが家名を隠そうとするならば、ますます疑念は募るだけだ。だが…私の目がめしいていようとも、その服装の高貴な紋章を見逃すことはない。そしてコンパス…これはローグトレーダー特有の礼装だ」
languages.original_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが家名を隠そうとするならば、ますます疑念は募るだけだ。だが…私の目がめしいていようとも、その服装の高貴な紋章を見逃すことはない。そしてコンパス…これはローグトレーダー特有の礼装だ」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr versucht, Euren Familiennamen zu verbergen, steigert das mein Misstrauen nur noch. Aber so schwach meine Augen auch sein mögen, sie erkennen das Adelswappen auf Eurer Kleidung noch. Und den Kompass — die Insignien, die nur Freihändler tragen dürfen."
languages.original_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr versucht, Euren Familiennamen zu verbergen, steigert das mein Misstrauen nur noch. Aber so schwach meine Augen auch sein mögen, sie erkennen das Adelswappen auf Eurer Kleidung noch. Und den Kompass — die Insiginien, die nur Freihändler tragen dürfen."

languages.text: « Vous ne faites que renforcer ma méfiance à votre égard en taisant votre nom de famille. Cependant... si faibles soient mes yeux, ils sont toujours capables de voir les armoiries de la noblesse sur votre tenue. De même que la boussole, l'insigne qui distingue les libres-marchands. »
languages.original_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne faites que renforcer ma méfiance à votre égard en taisant votre nom de famille. Cependant... si faibles soient mes yeux, ils sont toujours capables de voir les armoiries de la noblesse sur votre tenue. De même que la boussole, l'insigne qui distingue les libres-marchands. »

languages.text: "Soyadını saklamaya çalışman, sana karşı şüphelerimi artırmaktan başka işe yaramaz. Bununla beraber, gözlerim artık keskinliğini yitirse de kıyafetindeki soylu armalarını seçebiliyorum. Hür Tacirlere özgü bir sembol olan pusulayı da."
languages.original_text: "Attempting to hide your family name will only make me more suspicious of you. However... weak though my eyes may be, they can still make out the noble coat of arms on your attire. And the compass — the regalia unique to Rogue Traders."

traits.locale_text: "Soyadını saklamaya çalışman, sana karşı şüphelerimi artırmaktan başka işe yaramaz. Bununla beraber, gözlerim artık keskinliğini yitirse de kıyafetindeki soylu armalarını seçebiliyorum. Hür Tacirlere özgü bir sembol olan pusulayı da."
